comments.body:
Add a comment here justifying why you can write to this object that you don't own
Also, please make sure TextEditingController documents whether it's even remotely ok for one TextEditingController to be handed to multiple text fields at once. If it's not, please make sure we assert somehow that that is not happening.

I can't imagine a scenario where it would be sensible to pass the same controller to multiple `TextField`, `TextFormField`, or `EditableText` widgets -- user input would result in 'interesting' behaviour. I'll look at what it would take to protect against that. Doing this at the `EditableText` level probably covers everything in the framework.
Updated the class and constructor doc comments to explicitly document this behaviour.
